query: SELECT column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = 'customers' ORDER BY ordinal_position;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3PHp7ztbFBNkDxM.root --database fwhU47bCmMHPtMZqQZK4Tp --execute SELECT column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = 'customers' ORDER BY ordinal_position;
stdout:
column_name	data_type
id	varchar
name	text
email	varchar
phone	varchar
logFeeDiscount	varchar
customerType	varchar
active	enum
createdAt	timestamp
updatedAt	timestamp
address	text
